content: im headed to ft. benning soon and was wondering if anyone had any advice on how to be prepared for it?
reply: im headed to ft. benning soon and was wondering if anyone had any advice on how to be prepared for it?
title: any advice?

content: WALK 5 MILES A DAY. RUN 2 MILES A DAY. DON'T GET FAT BEFORE YOU GO. LEARN TO KEEP YOUR MOUTH SHUT AND DON'T TALK BACK EVER. BE SURE THERE ARE NO DRUGS IN YOUR SYSTEM. NONE STUDY THE ASVAB PRACTICE TESTS HERE UNTIL YOU GO BLIND. YOU DO USE THAT INFORMATION.

content: What MaineDawg said. Be in good physical shape and have the proper "can do" attitude and you'll be OK.
reply: What MaineDawg said. Be in good physical shape and have the proper "can do" attitude and you'll be OK.
title: any advice?

content: NEVER EVER forget that the Drill Insructors know a whole lot more than you do about the Army. By that I mean you may be asked to do things that you don't understand the meaning of it.....but there's a reason for everything and it just may save your life or someone elses down the road. Good luck to you and don't be a stranger here. Thank you for joining during all the fighting going on. Don Proud father of a U.S. Marine
